title: Underrated URF champions
body:
{{champion:143}} At level 3 she can zone you out from under your own tower with her Q+W plant spam.
{{champion:50}} Despite the healing nerf, if he ever gets close to you you're fucked.
{{champion:29}} Whenever his ult is up he gets a free tower.
{{champion:98}} Shield spam is crazy. AP Shen deals a ridiculous amount of damage. Best abuser of Zz'Rot imo.

replies.body:
{{champion:90}}:  Build AD.  Proceed to make an army of Voidlings.  Proceed to split-push.  Proceed to destroy full-HP towers in 3 seconds.  That is not an exaggeration.  

{{champion:111}}:  There is no escape from him...  So much CC and so much HP.  Even with the URF nerf, you can have your shield up constantly.  Also, your Q is on such a short CD that early game it's actually faster to stay next to a wall and drag yourself along than it is to walk down a lane.  When in the jungle you can also kite as Naut just by E'ing then Q'ing away and repeating.  Zz'rot's also really fun with him too.  

To be honest, {{item:3512}} itself is really strong in URF.  I'm not sure if no one else has caught on to its strength yet, but I've been getting it in nearly every game.  At one point, I had two out at once.  One was in top lane slowly breaking down the second-tier tower, and the second one was helping me smash down mid's Inhibitor tower.  ^_^
they nerfed nautiluss shield for urf......
Aye.  That's why I said "**Even with the URF nerf**, you can have your shield up constantly."

{{champion:1}}  -Tibbers is permanent. So are the stuns.

{{champion:16}}  - Do not underestimate a silence field on a 4s CD in a game mode based on spamming.

{{champion:134}} - She's got more balls than all the men in LOL.

{{champion:26}} - Whatyoumeantheressuchathingasbasespeed? AndwelcometoHiroshima.

{{champion:28}}  The 0.3 second q combined with luden's = insane damage. Plus you have a permanent movespeed buff.

{{champion:6}}  Maybe it is just because no one has him, but your q is a homing machine gun. That is just fun.

{{champion:54}} Started playing this full ap. I don't know why, but I just end up murdering everyone.

> [{quoted}](name=COWmanLord,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pedejHeo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-02T08:22:12.703+0000)
>
> {{champion:28}}  The 0.3 second q combined with luden's = insane damage. Plus you have a permanent movespeed buff.

Build spellvamp. Never die.
{{champion:5}}: My favorite pocket pick is AP Xin. Mash QWE repeatedly on a target - the satisfaction is real.
AP Tryn just blows my mind, and cuts through the enemy team like butter haha. That heal though too helps a whole lot

It seems everyone has forgotten how broken {{champion:126}} is.

I spam {{champion:126}} {{champion:111}} in urf

{{champion:131}} 
{{champion:39}}
{{champion:59}}

{{champion:38}} 
flash every 0.4 sec anyone?
1 sec

{{champion:222}} With a maxed Q and {{item:3046}} bought you can hit max attack speed for incredible turret destruction.  Q (fishbones) W and E all allow you to zone pretty well. 

{{champion:41}} Later in the game with crit bought and heal embargo a lot less severe he is able to sustain well and pump out insane damage. Ult clears waves or just simply help someone in need. 

{{champion:31}}  Get Q level 1, if you land a Q you can chain them forcing your opponent to either die or burn flash. W's silence is devastating in this game mode. 


{{champion:4}} Q might as well be his auto attack, ignore ranking E altogether for insane wave clear and damage. R helps you keep track of pesky stealth targets.
{{champion:268}} Build full AP and proceed to slaughter anyone who dares to come close. You have all the CDR and AS you will ever need, a dash every 3 seconds, and an ult every 20 seconds.
they actually nerffed the amount of damage shens shield can take

{{champion:83}}  endless ghoul slam with the ult always being up meaning people have to be killed twice. He becomes a huge tank due to the passive and sustain, but can also deal some severe damage. 

He is a literal monster mash.

> [{quoted}](name=The Red Warden,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pedejHeo,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2015-04-02T18:06:45.005+0000)
>
> {{champion:83}}  endless ghoul slam with the ult always being up meaning people have to be killed twice. He becomes a huge tank due to the passive and sustain, but can also deal some severe damage. 
> 
> He is a literal monster mash.

He has been who I've been playing. He's really fun and pushes like a beast, but if they get any of the broken mobility champs you are pretty much just a cannon minion.
In that situation ult your adc so they have to either focus on you or the ult ghost
The immobile ghost ult that can't use abilities in urf mode? What makes you think they will be anywhere near it for more than .01 seconds? Even if it is ranged.
I spam ghouls a lot early game and piss people off so they really want to kill me. If you don't piss people off with Yorick in URF you're doing something wrong.

If you need to rely on the stupidity of your lane opponent, a well designed champion he is not. I've spammed him a few games and there were some matches where I outlined a fizz and lb with sheer swarms. Then I fought a hecarim and he outclassed me In every fashion imaginable and the entire game I was made to feel like a second class citizen. No idea why they brought hecarim copter back and nerfed trap champs.
I never said he was well designed, and I don't think anyone thinks he is.
Agreed,  which is a shame, as the 'endless minion necromancer' is one of my favorite concepts.

Wanna see someone who doesnt care about yorick on URF? Sivir at level 1 and level 5-30. I played Sivir against Yorick. Level one, he couldnt get in range. Level 3 he won every trade. Then I rushed an avarice blade and a BF sword and powerfarmed, using his minions to get a huge gold advantage. Level 5, he couldnt fight me. That was the end of him lanning against me.

Like half the urf roster doesn't give a shit about yorick.  If you have range, blinks, or sustain,, you can out damage,  out kite, or just outright ignore him. He's fun for a laugh in lane when you're making your own minion wave. But that's about it. Was fun to proxy farm with him tho
true dat, yorick op in urf
Havent seen anyone play Moakai aside from me, and i just love spamming the Sap!
He can only throw 5. So you get jumped on, your seeds don't do enough to kill anyone,  they proceed to mash you into plywood..
I put 5 saplings in a bush, a lux TPed into the bush, then died instantly from it.

{{champion:78}}  build {{item:3152}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3145}} 
you are now the ultimate jungle monster

AP Poppy is extremely broken. You can very easily one shot anybody in the game no matter how fed they are at full build, not even a full AP Build. I have 0 idea why but it just does so much damage. People usually say "gg poppy trolling" in normal games but in URF or Normal games they usually shut up when you 1v5 the enemy team and win.

well if u hit some1 into a wall you can pretty much keep them there forever unless they flash/dash/blink.
even full item mundos cant get away.
so i find the SV more helpful esp when extras are attacking you
{{champion:9}}  very low cd on his ult and low cd on a aoe silence and a fear to back it up
{{champion:36}} ult only has 2 second cd on it, his q only has 0.8, he is pretty much unkillable
{{champion:98}} shield spam? No, his DASH is crazy XD
And then you see the other team picked any combination of Blitzcrank, Ezreal, Fizz, Hecarim, LebLanc, Shaco, Zed, Riven, Sona, Kassadin, and you lose cause you didnt...

{{champion:6}} - Oh, NOW  you shitholes think he's OP??


{{champion:3}} - Oh, NOW you shitholes think he's OP??

{{champion:82}}- Oh, NOW you shitholes think he's OP??

{{champion:19}}  pure AP
slow start early game but the Q never ends and the sustain can be terrifying. paired with nashor's tooth and rylai's, its OP!

Trundle is strangely strong in this mode for someone who just out-stats you to death, at least from my experience, especially when he gets some lifesteal and a Triforce, you can't fight him one on one.

And because his pillars are on such a low cooldown and provide a lot of vision, they make surprisingly good scouting tools.

And if all else fails and you can't fight anyone "Lol you thought you had a turret CHOMP SMACK CHOMP SMACK CHOMP SMACK"

EDIT: Also, "Rocket like a Hurricane"Jinx is just kind of silly, though I'm not sure if it's necessarily strong. {{item:3085}}
Zyra is great, swain is really good. She and twitch ain't special though.

AP {{champion:266}} 

His R has no downtime at rank 3 and its a huge 550 range AoE nuke and with LB and Gunblade he does a fuck ton of damage rather quickly. Your E can also permaslow people.

I would go to say that {{champion:54}} is top tier.

Unless your opponents have good reflexes, you have a combo to instantly burst anyone and everyone who gets caught in your ult. When it's on it's 16 second CD, you can still transition into an anti-melee mage with the kiting you get from your Q.

{{champion:68}}  can bully you all day with spam Q and over heat auto. He can spam shield and take tower hits without losing health. His shield + Rockets makes it easy for him to hunt you down.  His ult is 14 seconds which is the best, if not one of the best ults in the game.

{{champion:1}} I've seen them 1v5 with zero problems. 
{{champion:96}} Puts a lot of hurt down. (Go AP)
{{champion:50}} Hitting level 6 is his God Mode cheat.
{{champion:143}} Will out zone you. Out damage you. Out CC you.
{{champion:117}} Spam Q and W all day. Plus ult is ever 20 secs. I 1v2'd against a Riven and Hecraim. Keep E on them and slow them (or shield self). Polymore who ever dives you. Slow them constantly.
{{champion:236}} Dash have literally no cd if you land your passive. Dash up passive dash back passive dash sideway passive, kalista isn't even on his level in URF
If you're good at handling balls, try {{champion:61}}. Start off with level 1 Q, then E, then W, maxing Q and you will be unstoppable the entire game
I should also mention {{champion:56}} should be permabanned with how godly he is
